mapper.select: select cust_seq, cust_name, cust_id, cust_pw, cust_phone, cust_gender, cust_level from t_customer where cust_seq=#{cust_seq}

SELECT tr.reserv_seq, tr.reserv_request, tr.reserv_date, tr.reserv_time, tr.reserv_stat, st.style_name, hs.shop_name, hs.shop_image, s.staff_nickname FROM t_reservation tr LEFT JOIN t_hairstyle st ON tr.style_seq = st.style_seq LEFT JOIN t_hairshop hs ON st.shop_seq = hs.shop_seq LEFT JOIN t_customer cu ON tr.cust_seq = cu.cust_seq LEFT JOIN t_staff s ON tr.staff_seq = s.staff_seq WHERE tr.cust_seq = #{cust_seq} ORDER BY tr.reserv_date DESC, tr.reserv_time DESC;

select tr.review_seq, ha.shop_seq, ha.shop_name, re.reserv_seq, tr.review_score, tr.review_content, tr.review_photo, tr.review_date, tr.review_reply, st.style_name, s.staff_nickname
from t_review tr LEFT JOIN t_reservation re ON tr.reserv_seq = re.reserv_seq LEFT JOIN t_hairstyle st ON re.style_seq = st.style_seq LEFT JOIN t_hairshop ha ON st.shop_seq = ha.shop_seq LEFT JOIN t_customer cu ON re.cust_seq = cu.cust_seq LEFT JOIN t_staff s ON re.staff_seq = s.staff_seq where re.cust_seq=#{cust_seq} order by review_date desc, review_score desc;
select reserv_stat from t_review inner join t_reservation using(reserv_seq) where reserv_seq=#{reserv_seq}
mapper.insert: insert into t_review (reserv_seq, review_score, review_content, review_photo, review_date) values (#{reserv_seq}, #{review_score}, #{review_content}, #{review_photo}, #{review_date})
mapper.update: update t_review set review_score=#{review_score}, review_content=#{review_content}, review_photo=#{review_photo} where review_seq = #{review_seq}
